problem.markdown:
Parts in storage costs between the drilling and reaming machines cost $100.
>>What is the the final cost of the optimal line?<<
= 146830 +- 5%
>>What is the buffer size of the optimal line?<<
=1639 +- 5%
problem.p: Parts in storage costs between the drilling and reaming machines cost $100.
problem.label: What is the the final cost of the optimal line?
What is the buffer size of the optimal line?
